1.content:
Xander Harris had had enough. Tonight was his eighteenth brithday, today he was a man. Today it seemed all of his friends didn't have time for him.

There were some he expected to snub him. Cordelia was his ex, of course she was going to snub him, if she acknowledged him at all today it would be to verbally abuse him. That one was a given. Faith he now knew would treat him like dirt because they'd had sex last week. Apparently his thinking they'd had something was him just being missinformed. He'd scratched Faith's itch and that was that. Faith wasn't one to back track.

Giles was a pseudo father figure, not his actual father and as usual the Britt seemed to have several hundred things up in the air at the moment. And with no way of telling which of those were life or death Xander wasn't going to begrudge him any lack of birthday well wishing. The same could be said of Joyce his pseudo mother figure, she also had several other things to deal with each probably more important than his wounded ego. Oz wasn't exactly his buddy, he was his best friend's boyfriend, at best their relationship was cordial. Wesley was an annoyance that Xander would be glad to see gone. The same could be said for Angel, he was a particular pain in the ass that Xander wouldn't mind loosing.

However Willow and Buffy were different stories altogether. His bossom budies had deserted him. He knew his birthday wasn't going to be the leading news item today. Buffy being the Vampire Slayer would naturally be more focussed on whatever supernatural freak of the week they were facing this week, however a kind word should still have been said, a simple, 'hey happy birthday Xan-Man'. She'd managed last year.

Willow forgetting was like a dagger to his heart. Willow his boon companion, the peanut butter to his jelly, the laurel to his hardy, had forgotten his birthday. That damn near took his breath away. It was a betrayal at the fundamental level. Xander knew that their friendship wasn't on solid ground like it had been since they'd been caught kissing each other by their significant others but he had no idea their little affair had cracked their freiendship this badly. For this was the first time in thirteen years that Willow had forgotten his birthday.

For Xander this was akin to saying grass was now red, water was now dry, up was down, cats and dogs were now living together, to quote the great Bill Muarry 'mass hysteria!'

Hands fisting in his hair Xander Harris gave in to frustraton and forgot that wishing was a bad thing. You never knew who could be listening and grant that wish, twisting it and perverting it to their own nefarious purpose.

"I wish I could go somewhere where people wanted someone like me around."

"Granted!" A voice far deeper than any human's came from some place out of the blue and in an instant Xander Harris dissappeared from sight.
1.title: To boldy go where no Xander has gone before!

choices: go out and explore the new universe.
go out and test his new powers.
11.content:
waking up Xander looked around and noticed that he was in a strange apartment with no idea on how he got here. looking around he tried to find out how he got here and where he was when he found a letter addressed to him.

Dear Alexander Harris.

your probably wondering where you are well last night I was passing by when I heard your wish now normally I don't help humans unless it helps chaos but you are a special case. deciding to help you I granted your wish and teleported you to the marvel universe as well as giving you the power of superman with none of his weaknesses good luck.

Janus.

p.s. I lied your not special your disappearance from your home universe will cause untold amounts of chaos.

"Huh," Xander thought to himself. "The power of superman, I think I'm going to like it here."
11.title: Marvel Universe

13.content:
Xander dropped his hands from his hair and blinked his eyes. He did it again. He squeezed his eyes shut and rubbed the heels of his palms against his eyes. Because he could not be seeing what he was seeing. It was not possible that he was somehow, some way looking down on Earth. He was looking down on the planet.

Looking down on it like he was no longer on it. Like he was in space. Slowly, afraid to even breathe, Xander tilted his head left and then right looking around himself. It seemed like he was in a building, metal floor, walls and ceiling, doorway far off to the left, doorway far off to the right, apparently he was in a hallway. Xander tried to reassure himself that that was it. That was the only thing wrong. He'd just... some how gone from sitting in his bedroom to being in a office building hallway without noticing he was walking... somewhere. Xander didn't exactly believe that one himself, and frankly, he was pretty good at lying to himself.

"Ahem?" a voice asked from behind Xander.

Slowly Xander turned and felt his eyes widen and the blood drain from his face. He whispered, "Oh, mother puss bucket!"

As he lost consciousness Xander's eyes remained locked on the being before him. He couldn't believe he was looking at-
13.title: Holy crap, Toto, where the hell did Kansas go?

choices: Xander wakes up to Wonder Woman's gorgeous face.
Xander wakes up to the Martian Manhunter's green face in the med bay.
Wonder woman decides that some turn about is fair play and gives Xander a grope.
132.content:
As the world went dark Xander could ave sworn he was looking at Wonder Woman. Wonder Woman! In all her better looking than Linda Carter glory.

Wonder Woman raised an eyebrow in surprise as the boy before her looked shocked to see her before his eyes rolled up into his head. With a curious groan he then collapsed face first towards her. Wonder Woman was so surprised by the act that she didn't get her hands up in time to catch the young man thereby allowing him to face plant smack dab in her cleavage before gravity took hold and he slid down her body. The shock of it caused her to freeze, her body locking up as the boy's open mouth landed on the slope of her left breast only to drag down her flesh as he slide off her to the floor.

Jumping back to float in the air away from the slumbering teen Wonder Woman was both angered and aroused. Angered that any man would touch her in such a manner. And aroused in that it had felt so good. Shaking as she warred with her emotions Wonder Woman set foot on the floor again and stooped to rouse the teen.
132.title: Wonder Woman!

choices: Back on the road to med bay
1323.content:
Wonder Woman stopped a mere inch from touching the youth and for a second looked at the boy. He was not unattractive. He was not as handsome as Batman either. Still there was something compelling about the young man, Wonder Woman had to admit. It was an undeniable quality that seemed to radiate joy, loyalty and something else... something menacing. Something reminding her of her dealings with Batman.

"Diana."

Her senses picked up on the presence before she could even turn her head. The presence of a god.

She stood and slowly turned to face the god behind her. Her eyes widened when she saw not one but many. Apollo, Aphrodite, Hephaestus, Poseidon, Demeter, Athena, Artemis, Dionysus, Ares and his daughter Armonia.

Apollo stepped forward, "Hello Diana, I see you have found our avatar."

"Your..." her voice gave out on her as she cast her eyes from the group to the boy at her feet.

Poseidon spoke, "Yes, ours, even though he is not of our world we have claimed him now that his own has no use for him." The sea gods eyes burned bright for a second, "His living well here will be the best revenge."

Wonder Woman gave Poseidon a wide birth, he was a god that lived for revenge. "I don't understand."

"In his own home, in his own universe young Xander lived and died for his friends. He would fight to the death, into hell and back at the merest hint of trouble. He would lay down his life nobly so that those he called kin would go home at night to their loved ones. And in recompense for such service his friends spat on his loyalty and on his courage, undercut his determination and self worth. In a fit of peek our avatar called out to be taken somewhere where he would be of use..." Athena came to a stop not a foot from Wonder Woman, "We have decided that we have a use for the youth, Diana."

"Here he can exult in his war with 'evil'." Ares said with a smirk.

Diana glared at the god, "What do you mean his war?"

"Much like the Bat you favor our avatar has pledged himself to an eternal war against evil." Hephaestus said with a smile.

Artemis nodded her head, "And unlike the Batman you consort with, the boy has done so without the benefits of years of preparations or a vast wealth to draw upon. When presented with an evil at his tender age he dove into the Hunt, determined to see his work done without delay relying upon his wits and the strength in his limbs to see him through."

Wonder Woman didn't exactly like her relationship being termed consorting, that had a slightly uncomfortable connotation to it, however she was not about to start arguing with a pack of gods about their word choice. Or about her love life, or lack of love life since coming to man's world. Not that she was lacking in offers, it was just that she had found those offers lacking, the quality of those offering themselves as lovers was scanty at best. Unlike the offers from back home on Themiscara where taking a fellow Amazon as a lover was never a burden to her as she knew the character of the woman making the offer.

Aphrodite and her daughter Armonia stepped forward, their beauty both excited and pacified Diana. She had to admit that it was hard not to be turned on by the Goddess of love. Especially when you've spent most of your immortal life living on an island of all women, with all that that would entail for her love life and the dry spell she was enduring here in the 'real' world.

"Despite the fact that he has chosen his war, our avatar is ruled by his heart. He is a man of great love. His capacity to give love is beyond your imaging, Diana." Aphrodite spoke.

"He would bring peace to those that he loves, ease their pains and fears." Armonia said with a smile. "If breaking himself would ease the burdens of those he loved he would gladly throw himself into danger's path without a thought."

"And do it with a smile on his face and a joke rolling off his tongue." Dionysus grinned. "Give the man his due, he knows funny."

"And he knows that prophecy is only set in stone if you allow it. That young man knows more than he shows." Apollo said with a nod of his head to the boy, "Have care with the avatar, Diana, for he will never show you his true face. Only his enemies will know his true measure. For his hurts he will shield himself from others. The hurt done to him by his kin will leave deep scars, scars that will need healing if he is to be effective in this world."

Demeter stepped to Diana and took her hands in her own, making sure she had Wonder Woman's eyes on her the goddess spoke. "Be patient with our avatar Diana. We have brought him to you so that you may help him be what he is needed to be. The animal inside of him rages and needs taming."

"Am I late?" Hermes asked, materializing out of thin air. He looked around, "Oh good, just in time. Hey, Diana, see you met our wonder boy. Keep an eye on him. he's good but we're gonna make him great. Shoot, gotta go!" And with that Hermes disappeared.

Armonia and Aphrodite both came to Wonder Woman and each laid a hand upon her shoulder, Armonia spoke, "Our Avatar is out of balance, we've brought him to you to see him well. It is your charge to see our Avatar returned to his full vigor."

Aphrodite gave a wink and a grin, "And it wouldn't kill you to sample what the boy's selling. He's talented. Very, very talented." Aphrodite gave a knowing nod of her head, "Trust me."

Hephaestus limped forward moving his wife and step daughter away, "The boy has a deft hand when it comes to shaping things. Encourage this talent and you and yours will reap the rewards of the boys forge."

Apollo leaned in, "Remind the boy that music is a good thing and can be a healing experience. He forswore his instrument when his blood brother died. Help him see his error. I may be biased in this but it is truth."

Athena and Artemis chimed in, "The boy will swear he's dull and dim. Shake him from this perception. If he persists that he is dumb then you hone his cunning. While he may not think himself book smart he knows he's sneaky. Remind him of cunnings importance in the hunt."

Dionysus giggled, "Don't let him brood. In fact if he does, call him on it. He'll stop. Remind him helping people is a good thing and to always to do it with a laugh and a smile. I speak for me and speedy here."

Ares waved a hand, the other gods fell silent and stepped back. "Our avatar is in your hands, Diana, do not fail us. The consequences would be dire for you if the boy turned out not as we expect."

"Don't threaten me Ares." Wonder Woman growled.

"I wouldn't dream of doing so." Ares smiled grimly. "The threat comes not from us, but from the boy and the danger he poses."

It took but the blink of an eye but when Wonder Woman next looked upon the corridor she was alone with the boy. She hung her head, "Batman's not going to like this."
1323.title: Ye Gods

choices: Back to her quarters to think about this
Really should head to med bay
13232.content:
"Well, I thought they'd never leave."

Diana looked up into the smiling face of Hades. She jerked away from the god, floating back into the air, hands clenching, preparing to fight.

"Now, now, is that anyway to say 'Hi' to daddy?" Hades asked.

"What do you want, Hades?" Wonder Woman growled.

Hades inclined his head to the boy, "Remind the avatar that his job still stands. His war remains. Different place but the job remains the same. He may dally with your heroics, but he must still hunt the dead."

Diana frowned, "The dead?"

"Vampires. The boy is a vampire hunter. And other associated demons of course as well." Hades clasped his hands behind his back. "From time to time I may have work for him."

Wonder Woman shivered. The occupants of hell chilled her blood. That this boy had taken the fight to them without aid of super powers was astonishing. "I'll tell him."

Hades smiled, "Excellent. Now about the topic the ditz alluded to earlier." Hades sneered.

"What topic?" Wonder woman boggled.

"Taking the boy as a lover." Hades explained.

Diana recoiled, "I would never-"

Hades shrugged, "Pity." he turned away from her and walked away. "He would have brought you great joy, daughter."

Diana's mind raged, why was everyone talking about her love life? What business of it was theirs? "Stay out of my affairs Hades!"

He looked back over his shoulder at her, "You may not enjoy the fact that I am your Father, Diana, but it does not change the fact that I am. And like any father I want you to enjoy your life. I see the trouble you have with the detective and I found you an alternative. A man of like mind without the emotional baggage to bar the way of your happiness."

Diana was struck mute by that statement. Slowly she found she could speak, "Yo-you brought him here for me?"

"I searched high and low, daughter, for the right man for you. I found several candidates. Alexander was the only real choice when all was said and done."

Wonder Woman let out a strangled whine as she tried to imagine that thought.

"I'll tell your mother to expect a visit. And if you do not come to her I will arrange for her to come to you." Hades smiled again.

"Hera." Wonder Woman whimpered.

"Cannot help you." Hades answered as he faded away to nothing in a burst of flame.
13232.title: Daddy dearest

choices: Someone comes across Batman's investigation and takes Xander off his hands
Xander wakes up in the medical bay
Xander comes to with Batman looming over him.
133.content:
Batman watched the teen fall to the ground. He carefully noted the surroundings looking for a possible point of entry for the teen interloper, he scowled when none seemed apparent. His scowl intensified as he moved forward and looked over the teen sprawled on the ground.

His grim demeanor did not change as he observed everything about the boy. The 'crime scene' may have been completely unmolested leaving no contamination for him to worry about but still the thought that this boy had somehow breached the security of the Justice League's Watch Tower was maddening to Batman.

From the electric feel in the air Batman was more than likely only going to find one answer for the boys appearance and it was one he loathed. Magic. Somehow this boy had ended up dumped in their laps by magical means.

But before he determined that was the reason Batman first had to determine all the ways the boy hadn't used to arrive here. Hunkering down Batman got to work over the prone form of the boy, making a mental note to call for assistance with moving the boy after he had ruled the boy out as a possible threat.
133.title: The Dark Knight

135.content: He couldn't believe it because it just wasn't possible. Completely inconceivable. Nope. His brain was shutting down for a reboot for all the right reasons because he'd obviously flipped his lid. Because there was no way he was actually looking at-
135.title: OTHER

choices: Supergirl gets to the med bay no problems
She gets distracted on the way
She gathers a little crowd as she passess by.
1352.content:
Supergirl floated several inches off the ground watching as the guy in front of her blinked several times. Then his eyelids fluttered. Then he made a weird noise in the back of his throat and then he passed out. Faster than a speeding bullet she had him under control before he fell and cracked his head open. She held him bridal style in her arms and with a sigh she reoriented herself to fly towards the medical bay where she could dump off her mysterious discovery. Her mysterious discovery that wasn't altogether ugly to look at.

Shaking her head Supergirl wondered where that thought had come from.

Although she did have to concede that she hadn't exactly had a date in a almost a year. And if she wasn't on a satellite in space she was on a farm in Kansas neither of which were known for being hot-spots for hooking up. Also her 'big brother' was Superman and nothing intimidated a would be suitor like a guy whole can knock the moon out of orbit with a punch. Sighing Supergirl had to admit that she might just be a wee bit hard up for a date.

Not that she was hard up enough to just jump Mr. Mystery guest.

Yet.

Grumbling to herself about the injustices of her life Supergirl began moving more quickly towards the med bay.
1352.title: Supergirl

15.content:
Janus was a Chaos god. And for the most part he was a happy Chaos god. In Xander Harris he had found an acceptable avatar for his brand of chaos. Laying waist to the established order of the Powers That Be, the beings responsible for setting the laws that goverened the universe that Xander resided in,

Janus had been paying attention to his yet unanounced avatar and didn't like what he was seeing. The Powers That Be's agent, the Slayer, Xander's friend Buffy seemed to be systematically, albeit unintentionally, destroying his avatar's will to live. Ruining his avatar's special brand of Chaos.

Janus would not let that stand, he would protect his avatar and all he had to do was wait. As he expected his avatar made a wish and now Janus was in a position to step in a save his avatar's life. And perhaps strengthen the boy in the bargain.

Xander wished to be somewhere he was appreciated, among people of his own ilk.

Now Janus had a decision to make about where to send his avatar. Where would he best serve Chaos?
15.title: OTHER

choices: skip to Harry potter's first year.
151.content:
waking up Xander blinked as he spotted that he was in a house unfamiliar to him. looking around he spotted a note on a nearby table.

Dear Xander

when you made that wish earlier a demon took the chance and granted it thankfully I was able to interrupt and save you. but there was a cost you can now never return to your home dimension or see your friends ever again. good news is that I was able to save you by placing you in a world that you will be familiar with, that world is Harry potter and you are now a eleven year old who should be receiving your Hogwarts letter soon. I couldn't put you in the same year as Harry but I did make you closer to his year by two years. so you will be ahead of him by two school years now some advice tell no one who you really are or that you are from another universe. also try to stay off Dumbledore's, Voldemort's, and the ministry's radar for as long as possible. oh and you should know that you can do what ever you want here so be a good guy or a dark lord if you want.

that's all for now signed Janus god of door ways and chaos.

p.s. when you go to gringotts ask for a blood test to confirm your the heir to the black family.


"Huh that's cool," Xander says to himself after rereading the letter to make sure that it said what he thought it said before hearing a tapping noise on the window, looking over to the window Xander say an owl waiting for him. opening the window Xander grabbed the letter and told the owl to wait for his acceptance. opening the letter Xander was surprised to find where he lived written on the front.

Mr. Alexander Black.
the living room.
7 private drive.
little whining.
surrey.

"Huh so I live next to Harry potter do I," Xander thought to him self before moving on to read the whole letter.


Hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry.

headmaster: Albus Dumbledore.

Dear Mr. Black.
we are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry. please find the enclosed list of books and equipment. term begins September 1st we await your owl by no latter then July 31.
Yours sincerely,
Minerva McGonagall.
deputy headmistress.

uniform

first year students will require,
1. three sets of plain work robs. (Black)
2. one plain pointed black hat for day wear.
3. one pair of gloves.
4. one winter cloak.
please note all clothes should have your name on them.

course books.

all students should have a copy of each of the following.
1. the standard book of spells. (grade 1)
2. a history of magic.
3. magical theory.
4. a beginners guide to transfiguration.
5. one thousand magical herbs and fungi.
6. magical drafts and potions.
7. fantastic beasts and where to find them.
8. the dark forces a guide to self protection.

other equipment.
one wand.
one cauldron.
one set glass.
one telescope.
one set brass scales.

students may also bring an owl or a cat.

"Awesome I'm going to have so much fun with this," Xander said to himself with a smirk.
151.title: Harry Potter

1512.content:
riding on the train to Hogwarts Xander wondered who he would become friends with when a young woman with pink hair came in and asked. "Can I sit down here?"

"Sure," Xander said before introducing himself. "I'm Alexander nice to meet you."

"I'm Nymphodora Tonks," she replied before saying. "But call me Tonks."

"I see don't like your first name huh," Xander commented.

"Yeah I don't," Tonks told him before asking. "So this your first year?"

"Yeah it is, how about you?" he asked.

"No my second year," she replied.

"Cool," Xander said as he sat back and thought about what he would do while in the wizard world. his current thought was should he become a dark lord or should he stay a good guy.
1512.title: skip to Xander's first year.

155.content:
Blinking his eyes Xander was more then a little surpirsed to find himself some place different. Looking left and then right Xander could rightly confirm that he was not where he should be. He was by all accounts in some persons home. Not his own home. Some other persons home. Frowning he took a tentative step towards the door only to stop when it opened. Xander backed up and put his hands above his head. He wasn't looking to get shot by a home owner or anything.

The door opened wide and the woman that filled the doorway tilted her head to the side and studied Xander for all of a second.

He spoke out of nerves, "Hi. My names Xander. I have no idea how I got here so please don't kill me. What's your name?"
155.title: Konoha bound

info.brief_description: When you wish you've really got to be careful what you wish for.
info.description: Xander Harris has almost made a career out of being in the wrong place at the wrong time and tonight was no exception. Now all he's got to do is figure out how to get home when he's stranded himself several dimensions away from where he started.
info.pretty_title: Up the creek and no paddle
